trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<title>" name="<title>" href=""></xref> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: Consente l'accesso programmatico all'elemento <xref uid="langword_csharp_<title>" name="<title>" href=""> </xref> elemento sul server.

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlTitle class to programmatically specify the HTML `<title>` element of a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la classe HtmlTitle per specificare a livello di codice HTML `<title>` elemento di una pagina Web Form.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can also set the page title by using the `title` attribute of the [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive, or by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Title%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > È anche possibile impostare il titolo della pagina utilizzando la `title` attributo del [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) o impostando la <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Title%2A>proprietà di <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> control using default values.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo costruttore per creare e inizializzare una nuova istanza di <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>controllare utilizzando i valori predefiniti.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>

trans-unit.source: It creates an HTML `<title>` element on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Crea un elemento HTML `<title>` elemento nella pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> class.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente mostra il valore di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza della <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>|The "title" literal string.|
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Il valore iniziale | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>| La stringa letterale "title". |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle"></xref> control that an XML or HTML element was parsed and adds that element to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> collection of the control.
trans-unit.target: Notifica il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle"> </xref> controllo che un elemento XML o HTML è stato analizzato e aggiunge tale elemento per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> raccolta del controllo.

trans-unit.source: If the element added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> control is a <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> control, then the AddParsedSubObject method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle.Text%2A> property with the value of the literal string; otherwise, the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AddParsedSubObject%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Se l'elemento aggiunto per il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>controllo è un <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>controllo, quindi il metodo imposta AddParsedSubObject il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle.Text%2A>proprietà con il valore di stringa letterale; in caso contrario, la base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AddParsedSubObject%2A>metodo viene chiamato.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AddParsedSubObject%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>

trans-unit.source: The AddParsedSubObject method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo AddParsedSubObject viene usato principalmente dagli sviluppatori di controlli per estendere la funzionalità del <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the parsed element.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta l'elemento sottoposto ad analisi.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> collection for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> raccolta per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> object to contain the current server control's child server controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> oggetto che contiene i controlli server figlio del controllo server corrente.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle"></xref> control to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il rendering di <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle"> </xref> controllo specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The Render method first calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag%2A> method using the `Title` member of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo di rendering chiama prima il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag%2A>metodo usando il `Title` membro del <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>enumerazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, any child controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> control are rendered.
trans-unit.target: Successivamente, tutti i controlli figlio del <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>controllo vengono sottoposti a rendering.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderEndTag%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Infine, il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderEndTag%2A>metodo viene chiamato.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderEndTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> che contiene il flusso di output per il rendering sul client.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<title>" name="<title>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il testo del codice HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<title>" name="<title>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Use the Text property to specify or determine the title of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà di testo per specificare o per determinare il titolo della pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: The text of the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<title>" name="<title>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Il testo del codice HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<title>" name="<title>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una stringa vuota ("").
